snippet: Like many of his artist peers in Africa, Salif Diabagaté, in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, persists despite obstacles — like a recent civil war.
abstract: Artist Salif Diabagate in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, remains dedicated to his work despite obstacles and hardship, like a recent civil war; a healthy contemporary art scene exists in West Africa, fueled by adversity, with galleries, museums, collectors, journals, critics and a responsive audience (Series: An Art Critic in Africa).
lead_paragraph: Like many of his artist peers in Africa, Salif Diabagaté, in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, persists despite obstacles — like a recent civil war.

headline.seo: Salif Diabagaté and Other Artists Struggle in Africa
headline.main: Out of Adversity, Visions of Life
headline.print_headline: Out of Adversity, Visions of Life
